resources.string: Protection has been manually disabled for this app through DuckDuckGo VPN. To re-enable, configure in DuckDuckGo VPN.
Device traffic routing through the VPN. No tracking attempts blocked in apps (past hour).

string.name: vpn_SilentNotificationTitleAppTPAndNetpEnabledNoneBlocked
string.instruction: Placeholder is location of server with format City,Country.

resources.string: Device traffic routing through %1$s. No tracking attempts blocked in apps (past hour).

plurals.name: vpn_SilentNotificationTitleAppTPAndNetpEnabledBlocked

item.instruction: Placeholder 1 is location of server with format City,Country. Placeholder 2 is a number

plurals.item: Device traffic routing through %1$s. Tracking attempts blocked in %2$s app (past hour).

item.instruction: Placeholder 1 is location of server with format City,Country. Placeholder 2 is a number

plurals.item: Device traffic routing through %1$s. Tracking attempts blocked across %2$s apps (past hour).

plurals.name: vpn_SilentNotificationTitleAppTPAndNetpEnabledBlockedNoLocation
plurals.item: Device traffic routing through the VPN. Tracking attempts blocked in %1$s app (past hour).
Device traffic routing through the VPN. Tracking attempts blocked across %1$s apps (past hour).

resources.string: Action required! An Android setting needs to be changed for DuckDuckGo VPN.
Action required! Change an Android setting to use DuckDuckGo VPN and App Tracking Protection.
